title: Noise Control & Quiet Hours
description: Guidelines to ensure a peaceful living environment for all residents during critical rest hours.
rules: Quiet hours must be observed from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM daily.
Construction work is strictly prohibited on Sundays and public holidays.
Loud music or parties in common areas require prior written permission.

title: Waste Management & Disposal
description: Protocols for maintaining hygiene and proper segregation of household waste.
rules: Residents must segregate waste into Wet (Green bin) and Dry (Blue bin) categories.
Hazardous materials (batteries, medical waste) must be handed directly to collection staff.
Do not leave garbage bags outside apartment doors overnight.

title: Vehicle Parking Policy
description: Rules regarding the allocation and usage of parking spaces within the society premises.
rules: Residents must park only in their designated numbered slots.
Guest vehicles are allowed only in visitor parking zones for a maximum of 24 hours.
Washing of cars is only permitted in the designated wash bay area.

title: Swimming Pool Usage
description: Safety and hygiene regulations for residents utilizing the community swimming pool.
rules: Shower is mandatory before entering the pool.
Proper swimwear must be worn at all times (no cotton clothing).
Glass bottles and food items are strictly prohibited on the pool deck.

title: No Pets Allowed
description: No dogs, cats, birs or any other animal are permitted. Service animal require prior approval and documentation
rules: Pets are not allowed inside the apartment

title: Visitor & Delivery Access
description: Procedures for managing non-resident entry to maintain society security.
rules: All visitors and delivery personnel must register at the main gate via the society app.
Door-to-door sales and soliciting are strictly prohibited.
Overnight stay for support staff requires prior registration with the management office.
